com.jme.util.export.Savable, com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.common.interfaces.IView, IDynamicView, Serializable
public class CharacterView
extends DynamicView

CharacterView extends DynamicView to represent a dynamic animated view of CharacterEntity.
